00009 static double hb[3276800];
00010 static int hp[3276800];
00011 
00012 // new fitted values 
00013 const double pdf_mean = 60.8;
00014 const double pdf_rms = 23.89;
00015 const double spe_mean  = 64.922;
00016 const double spe_sigma = 19.914;
00017 const double exp_tau = 26.847;
00018 const double P_E = 0.1091;

00035 int MCOptical::Start_Run()
00036 { 
00037   Message(INFO) << "MCOptical Start \n";
00038 
00039   histPMT = &hb[0];
00040   barePMT = &hp[0];
00041 
00042   mc_written = 0;
00043 
00044   std::stringstream filename;
00045   filename<<"Run"<<std::setw(6)<<std::setfill('0')<<the_params.mch_run_number;
00046 
00047   mcwriter->SetFilename(filename.str().c_str());
00048   mcwriter->Initialize();
00049   mcwriter->SetRunID(the_params.mch_run_number);
00050 
00051   //  RunDB::runinfo *rinfo = mcwriter->GetRunInfo();
00052   the_runinfo.starttime = time(NULL);
00053   the_runinfo.comment = "MC Optical";
00054 
00055   // fser = TFile::Open("mc/R11065_ser.root","READ");
00056   // if(!fser->IsOpen()) {
00057   //   Message(ERROR) << " file mc/R11065.root is missing !!!\n";
00058   //   return -1;
00059   // }
00060 
00061   // hser = (TH1F*) fser->Get("R11065_ser");
00062 
00063   averageSPE(xxxt, pmt_ser);
00064     
00065   ser_integral = 0.0;
00066   for(int i=xtime_start; i<xtime_end; i++) ser_integral += pmt_ser[i];
00067   std::cout << " ser integral = " << ser_integral << " counts*bin" << std::endl;
00068 
00069   // optical MC interface
00070 
00071   tc1 = NULL;
00072   tc2 = NULL;
00073   ev = new MCOpticalEvent();
00074 
00075   std::cout << "Opening file = " << input_file.Data() << std::endl;
00076   fn = TFile::Open(input_file.Data(),"READ");
00077 
00078   if(!fn->IsOpen()) return -1;
00079 
00080   tree = (TTree*) fn->Get("mc");
00081   nevin = tree->GetEntries();
00082   std::cout << "Events in tree = " << nevin << std::endl;
00083   nevcurr = 0;
00084 
00085   tree->SetBranchAddress("MCOpticalEvent",&ev);
00086 
00087   return 0;
00088 }

00096 
00097 int MCOptical::Process(EventPtr event)
00098 {
00099 
00100   int idx;
00101 
00102   if( nevcurr == nevin ) {
00103     Message(ERROR) << " Maximum number of events in input tree reached !!!\n";
00104     return -1;
00105   }
00106 
00107   tree->GetEntry(nevcurr++);
00108 
00109   MCRawEventPtr raw(new MCRawEvent(ev->Get_Event(), ev->Get_Time(), ev->Get_Run()));
00110   size_t event_size_bytes = the_params.mch_number_of_channels*the_params.mch_number_of_samples*2;
00111   int blocknum = raw->AddDataBlock(RawEvent::MONTECARLO, event_size_bytes);
00112   buffer = raw->GetRawDataBlock(blocknum);
00113 
00114   EventDataPtr data = event->GetEventData();
00115   std::vector<ChannelData>::iterator chdata;
00116 
00117   int s_start, s_end, s_start_max;
00118   s_start = -1; s_end = -1; s_start_max = -1;
00119 
00120   tc1 = ev->getPMHitsPointer(1);
00121   tc2 = ev->getPMHitsPointer(2);
00122 
00123   // clean
00124 
00125   for(Int_t npmt=0; npmt<the_params.mch_number_of_channels; npmt++) {
00126     idx = npmt*the_params.mch_number_of_samples;
00127     for(Int_t itime = 0; itime<the_params.mch_number_of_samples; itime++) {
00128       histPMT[idx+itime]=0.0;
00129       barePMT[idx+itime]=0;
00130     }
00131   }
00132 
00133   if(the_params.mch_baseline != 0) {
00134 
00135     // baseline
00136     
00137     for(Int_t npmt=0; npmt<the_params.mch_number_of_channels; npmt++) {
00138       idx = npmt*the_params.mch_number_of_samples;
00139       for(Int_t itime = 0; itime<the_params.mch_number_of_samples; itime++) {
00140         histPMT[idx+itime] += the_params.mch_baseline;
00141       }
00142     }
00143 
00144     // random hits
00145 
00146     if(the_params.mch_single_rate != 0) {
00147 
00148       double prob = the_params.mch_single_rate * the_params.mch_sampling_time * 1.0e-9;
00149       Message(WARNING) << "single_rate <> 0 !!\n";
00150       for(Int_t npmt=0; npmt<the_params.mch_number_of_channels; npmt++) {
00151         idx = npmt*the_params.mch_number_of_samples;
00152         for(Int_t itime = 0; itime<the_params.mch_number_of_samples; itime++) {
00153           if(ran.Uniform() < prob) barePMT[idx+itime] += 1.0;
00154         }
00155       }
00156 
00157     }
00158 
00159     //    noise
00160 
00161     double low, up;
00162 
00163     for(Int_t npmt=0; npmt<the_params.mch_number_of_channels; npmt++) {
00164       double noise_level = 0.0;
00165       idx = npmt*the_params.mch_number_of_samples;
00166       for(Int_t itime = 0; itime<the_params.mch_number_of_samples; itime++) {
00167 
00168         low = -2.0 - (noise_level-5.0)/5.0;
00169         up = low+2.0;
00170 
00171         noise_level += ran.Uniform(low, up);
00172         histPMT[idx+itime] += noise_level;
00173       }
00174     }
00175 
00176   } else {
00177 
00178     for(chdata = data->channels.begin() ; chdata != data->channels.end(); chdata++){
00179       int id = chdata->channel_id;
00180       if(id < 0) continue;
00181       if(id >= the_params.mch_number_of_channels) continue;
00182       int nsamps = chdata->nsamps;
00183       if(nsamps < the_params.mch_number_of_samples) {
00184         Message(ERROR)<< "Not enough samples in input file !!!\n";
00185         return -1;
00186       }
00187       idx = id*the_params.mch_number_of_samples;
00188       if(s_start < 0) {
00189         s_start_max = nsamps-the_params.mch_number_of_samples;
00190         s_start = ran.Uniform(0, s_start_max);
00191         s_end = s_start + the_params.mch_number_of_samples;
00192       }
00193       int ii = 0;
00194       for(int isamp=s_start; isamp<s_end; isamp++) {
00195         histPMT[idx+ii] = 4095 - chdata->waveform[isamp];
00196         ii++;
00197       }
00198     }
00199 
00200   }
00201   
00202   // photoelectrons
00203 
00204   int tt,tx;
00205 
00206   //     S1
00207 
00208   Message(DEBUG) << " S1 hits = " <<  tc1->GetEntries() << "\n";
00209   for(Int_t ihit = 0; ihit < tc1->GetEntries(); ihit++) {
00210     pmh = (PMHit*) tc1->At(ihit);
00211     if( pmh->detector_index > the_params.mch_number_of_channels ) continue;
00212     idx = (pmh->detector_index-1)*the_params.mch_number_of_samples;
00213     tt = (int) ( (pmh->time*1000.0) / ((double) the_params.mch_sampling_time) + 0.5);
00214     tx = tt + the_params.mch_trigger_delay;
00215     if(tx < the_params.mch_number_of_samples) {
00216       barePMT[idx+tx] += 1;
00217     }
00218   }
00219 
00220   //     S2
00221 
00222   Message(DEBUG) << " S2 hits = " <<  tc2->GetEntries() << "\n";
00223   for(Int_t ihit = 0; ihit < tc2->GetEntries(); ihit++) {
00224     pmh = (PMHit*) tc2->At(ihit);
00225     if( pmh->detector_index > the_params.mch_number_of_channels ) continue;
00226     idx = (pmh->detector_index-1)*the_params.mch_number_of_samples;
00227     tt = (int) ( (pmh->time*1000.0) / ((double) the_params.mch_sampling_time) + 0.5);
00228     tx = tt + the_params.mch_trigger_delay;
00229     if(tx < the_params.mch_number_of_samples) {
00230       barePMT[idx+tx] += 1;
00231     }
00232   }
00233 
00234   double ser_norm;
00235 
00236   for(Int_t npmt=0; npmt<the_params.mch_number_of_channels; npmt++) {
00237     idx = npmt*the_params.mch_number_of_samples;
00238     for(Int_t itime = 0; itime<the_params.mch_number_of_samples; itime++) {
00239       if(barePMT[idx+itime] == 0) continue;
00240       for(int iphe=0;iphe<barePMT[idx+itime]; iphe++) {
00241         if(ran.Uniform() < P_E) {     // expo tail
00242           ser_norm = - TMath::Log(ran.Uniform(0.0, 1.0))*exp_tau;
00243         } else {
00244           ser_norm = ran.Gaus(spe_mean, spe_sigma);
00245         }
00246         ser_norm /= ser_integral;
00247         int ioff,ptime;
00248         ioff = xtime_ser - xtime_start;
00249         for(int is=xtime_start; is<xtime_end; is++) {
00250           ptime = itime - ioff + is - xtime_start;
00251           if(ptime>=0 && ptime<the_params.mch_number_of_samples) histPMT[idx+ptime] += pmt_ser[is]*ser_norm;
00252         }
00253       }
00254     }
00255   }
00256 
00257   unsigned int *bufint = (unsigned int*) buffer;
00258   unsigned int x1,x2;
00259   int count;
00260 
00261   count = 0;
00262 
00263   for(Int_t ii=0; ii<the_params.mch_number_of_channels; ii++) {
00264     idx = ii*the_params.mch_number_of_samples;
00265     for(Int_t itime = 0; itime<the_params.mch_number_of_samples; itime+=2) {
00266       x1 = (unsigned int) (histPMT[idx+itime  ] + 0.5);
00267       x2 = (unsigned int) (histPMT[idx+itime+1] + 0.5);
00268       if(x1 & 0xFFFFF000) x1 = 0xFFF;
00269       if(x2 & 0xFFFFF000) x2 = 0xFFF;
00270 
00271       x1 = 4095 - x1;
00272       x2 = 4095 - x2;
00273 
00274       bufint[count++] = x1 | (x2 << 16);
00275     }
00276   }
00277 
00278   mcwriter->Process(MCEventPtr(new MCEvent(raw))); //< writes event to disk
00279   mc_written++;
00280 
00281   return 0;
00282 }

00284 int MCOptical::Finalize()
00285 {
00286   //  Message(INFO) << "MCOptical Finalize \n";
00287 
00288   return 0;
00289 }
00290 
00291 int MCOptical::End_Run()
00292 {
00293   Message(INFO) << "MCOptical End \n";
00294 
00295   fn->Close();
00296 
00297   // RunDB::runinfo *rinfo = mcwriter->GetRunInfo();
00298   // rinfo->endtime = time(NULL);
00299 
00300   mcwriter->SetSaveConfig(true);
00301 
00302   ParameterList *rinfo = mcwriter->GetRunInfo();
00303 
00304   the_runinfo.runid = the_params.mch_run_number;
00305   the_runinfo.events = mc_written;
00306 
00307   the_runinfo.type = "regular";
00308 
00309   // RunDB::runinfo::channelinfo *cinfo = rinfo->GetChannelInfo(1);
00310   // if(cinfo != NULL) std::cout << "found" << std::endl;
00311 
00312   MC_RunInfo::channelinfo cinfo;
00313   for(int ii=0; ii<the_params.mch_number_of_channels; ii++) {
00314     cinfo.amplification = 10;
00315     cinfo.channel = ii;
00316     cinfo.spe_mean = pdf_mean;
00317     cinfo.spe_sigma = pdf_rms;
00318     cinfo.reload_cal=false;
00319     cinfo.reload_cal_run=false;
00320     cinfo.calibration_channel=ii;
00321     cinfo.calibration_run=the_params.mch_run_number-1;
00322     cinfo.voltage=1323;
00323     the_runinfo.channels.push_back(cinfo);
00324   }
00325 
00326   the_runinfo.endtime = time(NULL);
00327 
00328   rinfo->RegisterParameter("runinfo", the_runinfo, "");
00329   rinfo->RegisterParameter("MC_Params", the_params, "");
00330 
00331   mcwriter->Finalize();
00332   return 0;
00333 }
